sentences.en: Check out the close up shot, and drool!
sentences.cn: 来个特写, 要流口水就尽管流吧!

sentences.en: Guy 1: The pool of drool on the table from your dozing off.
sentences.cn: 1号男: 看看你打盹时流的那滩口水吧.

sentences.en: His bladder had let loose and there was drool on his chin.
sentences.cn: 他已经丧失了男人的底气,下巴沾满口水.

sentences.en: I did get a drool - provoking glimpse at him without his shirt, though.
sentences.cn: 不过,我的确在他脱衬衫时匆匆的, 色眯眯的扫了他一眼.

sentences.en: I was testing my keyboard for drool resistance.
sentences.cn: 我在测试键盘的‘防口水’性能.

sentences.en: I was testing the keyboard for drool resistance.
sentences.cn: 我这是在测试键盘对口水的抵抗能力如何.

sentences.en: It was really old and used to drool. It farted, too. Disgusting.
sentences.cn: 它真的很老了, 而且流口水, 还会放屁呢, 真是恶心死了.
现在,闭上你们的鸟嘴流口水吧.

sentences.en: Restaurant mentioned the Museum Restaurant head Wang, many people will be eaten outflow to drool.
sentences.cn: 提到湘菜馆的湘菜鱼头王, 不少吃过的人都会流出口水来.

sentences.en: Tears of joy , drool of joy — same thing, different duct.
sentences.cn: 快乐的流眼泪,兴奋的流口水—这是一回事, 只是分泌管不同而已.

sentences.en: The dog was drooling at the mouth.
There's enough variety here to make any [ botanist ] [ drool ] .
sentences.cn: 这里的植物多样性足以让每个植物学家 喜出望外.

sentences.en: To let saliva drip from the mouth; drool.
sentences.cn: 让唾液从口里流下; 流口水.

sentences.en: You always drool whenever people are eating something. You really are useless!
sentences.cn: 你真没出息,别人吃东西, 你就流涎!

sentences.en: You're the harbinger of drool. Mow my lawn without a shirt, Johnny Dirt.
sentences.cn: 你是让我们兴奋地垂涎三尺的预兆, 在我的草场上不穿衬衫地割草.

trans.tran_en: to let  saliva (= the liquid in your mouth )  come out of your mouth

trans.tran_cn: 流口水，对某人或某物流露出痴迷的神情，痴情地看，迷恋地看
